required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Registry for Patients With Erdheim-Chester Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Registry for Patients With Erdheim-Chester Disease

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators want to understand more about what kinds of health problems are caused by Erdheim-Chester Disease (ECD), what happens as a result of different treatments for ECD, and how ECD affects people's lives, their feelings and their attitudes. The investigators also want to learn how these things change over time for people with ECD. To try to figure this out, doctors would like to collect information about people who have ECD and how they are treated for this disease.
Some participants will be asked to complete a brief interview over the telephone. Only a limited number of interviews will take place, and not everyone will be asked to participate in the interview. It is okay if the participant does not want to participate in the interview portion. If this is the case, the participant should let the study team member know when contacted.

primary_outcome.description: This ECD registry is motivated to capture comprehensive clinical information as well as patient-centered data about ECD patients.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with Erdheim-Chester Disease will be enrolled in this registry study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of Erdheim-Chester Disease by either 1) documented histopathologic establishing ECD or 2) documented histopathologic findings compatible with Erdheim-Chester disease in the context of corroborating clinical and/or radiologic findings or 3) documented radiologic findings, in the absence of a biopsy having been performed or yielding evaluable tissue, that are felt by the Principal Investigator to unequivocally represent an ECD diagnosis given the clinical context or 4) self reported with supporting documentation upon medical record collection.
- Proficiency in English, in the determination of the Investigator or by self report.
- Willing to have historical and future ECD-related health records sent to Registry review.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients unwilling to sign consent.
- Participants under the age of 18.
